availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert L. Cobb (Lyon County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, merchant. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Married to Cornelia B. Cobb. Father of Robertson H. Cobb, Linah M. Cobb, Joshua C. Cobb, Sam Glenn Cobb, Robella Cobb, and Mark T. Cobb. Merchant in Caldwell County in 1850. Merchant in Eddyville in 1860. Owned eleven enslaved persons in 1850 and fourteen in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 76; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 835; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 98; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 12; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, p. 24.
